title: (1) Berlin: The Neue Wache and Zeughaus from close to the Opera House, with the Statue of Blücher in the Foreground; Details of the Zeughaus and the Statues of Bülow and Scharnhorst Above; (2) Berlin: The Domkirche and Marienkirche
credits: Accepted by the nation as part of the Turner Bequest 1856
